healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.title: Healing Campfire Config
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_c: How often in ticks the mod checks for campfires around the player. 1 second = 20 ticks, so by default every 2 seconds.
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.checkF: Check For Campfire Delay In Ticks
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_h: The radius around the campfire in blocks where players receive the regeneration effect.
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_e: The duration of the regeneration effect which the campfire applies.
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_r: The level of regeneration which the campfire applies, by default 1.
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_h: When enabled, the campfire heals passive mobs around where the radius is half the width of a bounding box.
When enabled, hides the particles from the regeneration effect around the campfire.
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_c: When enabled, the campfire only has an effect when the block is lit up.
When enabled, the campfire only has an effect when the block is signalling.
healingcampfire-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_e: When enabled, the mod will work with normal campfires.
When enabled, the mod will work with soul campfires.
